attributes.additional_details:
http://www.royal.gov.uk/HistoryoftheMonarchy/KingsandQueensoftheUnitedKingdom/TheStuarts/MaryIIWilliamIIIandTheActofSettlement/TheActofSettlement.aspx

The Act protects the Protestant Succession, establishes the Glorious Revolution Settlement and provides freedom of religious expression for all under the law.

rejection.details: The petition is valid.  However the weblink should be removed.
